headline: As US Faces Severe Cold and Snow, These Stocks Are Heating Up
summary: Natural gas stocks and ETFs have surged this week as severe winter weather warnings across the U.S. have driven natural gas prices higher.

headline: How Volatility Skew Could Be Favorably Mispricing Expand Energy (EXE) Call Options
summary: Amid an uncertain environment in natural gas pricing, the hedging activity for EXE stock may have opened up a contrarian opportunity.
